titles.title: The Lord is Building His House (To the tune of “When Johnny Comes Marching Home”)

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Standing before the throne of God are royal priests. The worship and praises offered there shall never cease. His bondslaves will forever be all those who dwell in His liberty, and they’ll reign forever before the throne of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Lamb of God is waiting for his wife His bride; the bride of Christ who came out from His wounded side. To Jesus Christ she is looking away, and with all her heart longing for the day of the wedding feast – “Behold the city of God!”{/lang-eng}
